text: daqnyanmuKa#M kuryAth sruqvENA#&GAqramA GA#rayati yaqj~jasyaq praj~jA$tyaiq parA#~gatiqkramya# juhOtiq parA#ca EqvaiByO lOqkEByOq yaja#mAnOq BrAtRu#vyAqn pra Nu#datEq puna#ratyAqkramyO#paqsada#M juhOti praqNudyaiqvaiByO lOqkEByOq BrAtRu#vyA~jjiqtvA BrA#tRuvyalOqka-maqByArO#hati dEqvA vai yAH prAqtaru#paqsada# uqpAsI#daq-nnahnaqstABiqrasu#rAqn prANu#dantaq yAH sAqya(gm) rAtri#yaiq tABiqryath sAqyaM prA#tarupaqsada#- [  ] 17
